page.title: 13Childrens Games and Pastimes
page.content: There are lots of games to play,some are very old which have been going for years and years.There is an old game called Hopscotch,my Mum said that she used to play this when she was a little girl.There is a game called Red Rovers which is one of my favourite games,what you have to do is have a group of children and split the group up into 2 teams.The 2 teams go to two different ends of the field and hold hands.Then a person from one of the teams runs up to the other team and tries to break through the other teams arms.If he gets through he can choose someone from that team to come and be a member of his team.If he doesn's get through he stays with that team.We also play French Skipping,Tig on the Lines, British Bulldog and Horses. Lisa Davies.
